product_name: The North Face Gotham Jacket - Men's
long_description: Designed in a classic bomber silhouette with removable faux fur, The North Face Gotham jacket for men offers the toasty warmth of down and waterproof protection for cold-weather urban treks. Nobby nylon HyVent(R) shell is waterproof, breathable and fully seam sealed. Insulated with quality 550-fill-power down for warmth, light weight and compressibility. Recycled polyester taffeta lining slides on easily. Hood cinches down to keep your head warm; faux fur trim zips off when not wanted. Interior windflap backs full-length zipper and restricts cold air entry. Rib-knit cuffs and hem seal in the heat. Snap-flap hand pockets, snap-flap chest pockets (1 also has a zipper), and single bicep pocket. The North Face Gotham jacket features a zippered interior media pocket with an earphone cord port.
short_description: Designed in a classic bomber silhouette with removable faux fur, The North Face Gotham jacket for men offers the toasty warmth of down and waterproof protection for cold-weather urban treks.
